title: Bankers Readying US IPOs Ahead of 2026
description: Behind The scenes, the US IPO market is heating up. With equity indexes near record highs and companies emerging from the shutdown backlog, bankers say they're seeing a surge in mandates and early signs that 2026 could be a breakout year. Bloomberg's Bailey Lipschultz talked about the story on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
